channel.title: Statistics on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on My New Hugo Site

item.title: A Screwy Straw Stat
item.description: [big]As you may or may not know, I often speak up against the way that sometimes, a “fact” will show up on Wikipedia, unchallenged, for years, only to stumble into books large and small over the next number of years, something I call “The Windex Problem.”[/big] But what if the data point is something being shared not by an encyclopedia, but by a number of nonprofits looking to make the case for a bigger mission?
